item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode_每日一题 3.18-2043. 简易银行系统 难度：中等 模拟 class Bank { private long[] accounts; private int accountSize; public Bank(long[] balance) { accounts = balance; accountSize = balance.length; } public boolean transfer(int account1, int account2, long money) { if(account1 > accountSize || account2 > accountSize || account1 <= 0 || account2 <= 0) return false; if(accounts[--account1] < money) return false; accounts[account1] -= money; accounts[--account2] += money; return true; } public boolean deposit(int account, long money) { if(account <= 0 || account > accountSize) return false; accounts[--account] += money; return true; } public boolean withdraw(int account, long money) { if(account <= 0 || account > accountSize || accounts[--account] < money) return false; accounts[account] -= money; return true; } } /** * Your Bank object will be instantiated and called as such: * Bank obj = new Bank(balance); * boolean param_1 = obj.
